Used to be my favorite pants for years. Now the length is totally different- so much shorter with the same size. I’m 5.8 and large size used to fit perfectly. Now it covers only half of my calf. Unfortunately returning all of them - ordered multiple colors.

I ordered these around my birthday and so I was looking forward for getting them.  I always check and double check the measurements of clothing from Amazon because it is so hit and miss.  The quality of the pants seemed pretty good.  However, when they arrived I tried them on and they were too tight in the crotch.  The way they were cut there was absolutely no give in the crotch.  If I tried to walk around or bend over with them on they probably would have ripped.  There was plenty of room in the seat and waist.  The legs were wide enough.  Where the legs were sewn in at the crotch there was just not enough fabric.  So with them on, every move seemed to tug at the crotch like they would rip any second.  I am a short person and often have to buy pants in a short length otherwise the legs are way too long.  Even with the pants hiked up they still felt tight in the crotch

评论概述: I Love This Style of Pants!
评论详情: Very light and flowy...I love these pants, but...I hate the ankle elastic. Why do I continue to buy them? The ankle elastic runs through the hem. I undo a couple of stitches, pull out the elastic through the small opening, cut it, pull the elastic through and out and a dot of liquid seam lock closes the opening. The pants are so comfortable and wash up so easily, they are a dream for travel. They pack up very small....roll them up and no wrinkles! They come in beautiful boho patterns and multicolors, they are very versatile and can go with tees and tunics. Edited to add: the pocket is plenty big for my Galaxy S22 Ultra.

I love everything about these pants! The fabric, the quality, and the comfortable waistband! Perfect for any plus sized people who want haram pants, they fit me perfectly! I am 5’9” and weigh 260lbs and the 3XL fit me. Definitely going to buy more in different colors!

My daughter is that in between body type from puberty to young lady and feels like everything makes her look fat. She lives this style but could never find one that was flattering on her. … WELL THE SEARCH ENDS HERE!! SHE IS IN LOVE WITH TGESE PANTS!She feels so good about herself when she wears them!  We ordered two in two different sizes not being sure if they were true yo size- and will most certainly go back and order more. NOTE-they are true to size if not a bit big (which is what she liked! She is 5’7 plus inches tall (growing more what seems like every day!) and wears a size 16/18. Both pair  were big on her but she did not care. The elastic waistline has a lot of give and enabled her to still wear them. When we order again we will go down a size and give it a try. The color and design is very vibrant and the fabric really soft. A cool detail is that they took time to match the pattern as it transfers from one leg to the other which she thought was really cool feature. She has also has a lot of people compliment her and ask for the link to purchase a pair- which did wonders for her self esteem!

评论详情: PLEASE ORDER MUCH BIGGER THAN NORMAL SIZE. I wear between a 26 and 28 in jeans , I'm 5'2" 115 lbs. I ordered an extra large because I read the reviews and chart first. I probably could have gotten away with just the large.  but the waist and length fit perfect. They look just like the picture they display. Very comfortable and cute. I am happy with them.

Once you wear these pants you will want to wear nothing but these pants every day. Sure you may have your favorite jeans but they are not half as comfortable as these pants. I know you have athletic pants that you use to lay on the couch. There are not nearly as lounge-y as these pants. And yah, you have a pair of pants that you get “so many” compliments on, but not only will people say how much they love these pants but they will also say how “stylish” you are. Even if you are wear nothing but these pants, a plain black shirt, and flip flops. Then when you are on your compliment high, you can go home and comfortable lay on your sofa, what Netflix, and eat ice cream. These pants will not judge. They won’t even leave lines on you belly after you finish the whole carton of ice cream. These pants are heavenly.
